name: amazon-textract-response-parser
description: Parse API responses from Amazon Textract with higher-level helpers

scripts.audit:examples: (set -e && for ex in examples/*; do if [ $ex == 'examples/README.md' ]; then continue; fi; (cd $ex && npm audit fix); done)
scripts.//: # TODO: Remove below `replace` fix when https://github.com/microsoft/TypeScript/issues/54879 resolved
scripts.build:types: tsc -p tsconfig.types.json && replace 'readonly text: string;' 'get text(): string;' ./dist/types -r
scripts.build: concurrently -n 'iife,cjs,es,types' 'npm run build:browser' 'npm run build:cjs' 'npm run build:es' 'npm run build:types'
scripts.//: # TODO: clean:examples command is not yet cross-platform - requires bash-like shell
scripts.clean:examples: (set -e && for ex in examples/*; do if [ $ex == 'examples/README.md' ]; then continue; fi; (cd $ex && rimraf node_modules); done)
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run test:examples
scripts.//: # TODO: test:examples command is not yet cross-platform - requires bash-like shell
scripts.test:examples: (set -e && for ex in examples/*; do if [ $ex == 'examples/README.md' ]; then continue; fi; (cd $ex && npm install && npm run test); done)
scripts.update:examples: (set -e && for ex in examples/*; do if [ $ex == 'examples/README.md' ]; then continue; fi; (cd $ex && npm update); done)

author: Amazon Rekognition Textract Demos <rekognition-textract-demos@amazon.com>
